content: flip your work row 7 rs k until 3 sts left sl 3 pwyif flip your work row 8 ws k until 3 sts left sl 3 pwyif flip your work repeat row 1-8 until you have 7 sts left last row k2 k2tog sl 3 pwyif then continue to bind off in finishing section finishing bind off with knit sts cut yarn and weave in your ends you should have enough yarn to make a few little tassels or poms for the ends if you like i hope you enjoyed making this simple little scarf simple little scarf | north road knits ©2026 | 4
